artist: Artist: Kamisaka Sekka; Artist: Lacquer by Kamisaka Yūkichi
creditline: Gift of Wilson Grabill in honor of Elizabeth and Willard G. "Bill" Clark
description: cylindrical shape; cover has two cutouts on exterior of in the shape of closed fans; dark red overall with orange leaf on cover; exterior of container decorated with red and green leaves
text: Sekka’s younger brother Yūkichi was a lacquer artist and produced several of Sekka’s designs like this box. The cover of this vessel is cut with fan-shaped apertures to offer a glimpse of the decorated container beneath offering a unique and elegant play between the container and its lid.
title: Food container
